attributes.action: 4 days a month is not enough for separated Dads
attributes.additional_details: Please change the UK law and give separated Fathers more rights to see their children. Four days a month is not enough and separated Fathers should not have to spend thousands on solicitors costs fighting ex partners. The money should be spent on the children instead. Please help promote shared parenting and where appropriate allow children an equal opportunity with both parents.
attributes.background:
For all the loving and devoted Fathers
out there who are denied access to their children due to the current law of only 4 days a month

rejection.details:
We think you might want similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/130560
